    Add blocks to trial design

    add_blocks.Rd

    Delineate blocks on a trial design and assign block id to all the plots

    add_blocks(td)

    Arguments

    td

    trial design made by applying assign_rates() to experimental plots made by make_exp_plots()

    Value

    trial design with block_id added

    Examples

    #--- load rate information ---#
data(trial_design)

#--- add blocks ---#
td_with_blocks <- add_blocks(trial_design)

#--- take a look ---#
td_with_blocks$trial_design
#> [[1]]
#> Simple feature collection with 609 features and 6 fields
#> Geometry type: POLYGON
#> Dimension:     XY
#> Bounding box:  xmin: -88.70078 ymin: 39.11957 xmax: -88.69604 ymax: 39.12696
#> Geodetic CRS:  WGS 84
#> First 10 features:
#>    rate strip_id plot_id       type block_id plot_id_within_block

#--- visualize ---#
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(td_with_blocks$trial_design[[1]]) +
  geom_sf(aes(fill = factor(block_id))) +
  geom_sf_text(aes(label = plot_id_within_block)) +
  scale_fill_discrete(name = "block_id") +
  theme_void()
#> Warning: st_point_on_surface may not give correct results for longitude/latitude data
#> Warning: Removed 1 rows containing missing values (`geom_text()`).
